channel.title: incredibly choppy
channel.description: My computer more than meets the sys. req. however im finding even putting options on low and low resolution every few seconds the game just freezes for like .5 sec..makes it pretty unplayable for me atm, anyone aware of what might be causing this?

item.title: incredibly choppy
item.dc:creator: Skitch
item.description:
Try this:
https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Showbudget
It might give you some insights on what’s slow.
